title: Ticket #5771: history_helper does not stop sending data when the client exits.
description: The condor_history_helper binary does not stop reading from the history file and trying to send data when putClassAd fails. So even if the client closes the connection, the history_helper will continue to read from the history file until it gets to the end of the file (or 10000 records if that limit is in effect).
